BWGS (BreedWheat Genomic Selection pipeline)

The R package BWGS is developed by Louis Gautier V.G. Tran louis.gautier.tran@gmail.com and Gilles Charmet gilles.charmet@inra.fr. This repository is forked from original repository and modified as a R package.

Installation

Install from CRAN

install.packages("BWGS")

Install dev version from github Github

devtools::install_github('eurominister/BWGS')

Documentation

See full documentation from original repository and publication.
